name: Credit Bureau Request
Description: These are the additional input values required by the DEBankForAll evaluation function. This is (at least to start) a German specific initiative (hence "DE") to deal with a class of consumers who are adverse to using credit cards and use debit cards at guest checkout time. This interface facilitates approving more such requests. In addition, though it is associated with Risk Profile Service, a non-transactional decision engine, it will also invoke the vendor one time (to save money) and provide user credit information, which may be of interest even to non-transactional decision-making.  The information will be passed back and turned into an event so that those who are interested in transactional level risk judgements can capture and use the data.

client_id.Description: Required. The PayPal account number. WAX ID if guest or actual number (input decides). source: input

customer_email.Description: Optional. If in customer account, provide. Source: from DB

channel.Description: Optional. Arvato proposes: mobile, POS, web, other. source: constant

machine_id.Description: Optional. This requires mobile phone info to be passed along.  One vendor calls this a Tracking ID. source: source unknown

time_on_file.Description: Required on Transactional Input, Optional otherwise. (Unsigned) time on file in seconds (standard PayPal conventions). source: input

trans_type.Description: Required. Values: uELV, ELV, CC, EFT, PUI Invoice, PAD, Balance, other. source: from input (select from constants)

trans_amt.Description: Required on Transactional Input, Optional otherwise. Transaction amount. In USD, so no currency code. From user is a standard PayPal long integer with currency "in pennies." Format to Arvato is XXXXXXX.XX (X is a digit, leading 0s optional, up to seven digits on left, two on right). Source: from trans input

mobile_phone.Description: Optional. The user's mobile phone, provide if known. source: from input

landline_phone.Description: Optional. User's landline phone, provide if known. source: from input

use_case.Description: Required. Values: Guest Bank Checkout, Guest EFT Checkout, Guest CC Checkout, Add Bank Checkout, Add Bank Profile, Other. Source: from input (select constant)

paypal_product_flow.Description: Required on Transactional Input, Optional otherwise. Values: On eBay EC, On eBay other, Off eBay WPS, Off eBay other, Other. Source: from input (from DB)

beneficiary_details.Description: Optional. Representing a beneficiary of financial Instrument, like Name/Address/Phone/Identifiers

birth_day.Description: Required on Transactional Input, Optional otherwise. This is a true date, not a timestamp. Null/empty if absent. Required on guest checkout (or any credit check). source: input
